A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After seeing Rise of Skywalker\, it was even more obvious how absolutely terrible The Last Jedi was ....\nThe Last Jedi was terrible because it didn't draw you into the story\, so the horrible plot holes and science mistakes were just sooooo blatant and painful.   Gravity Bombs\, phone pranks\, etc in just the first few minutes set the bad tone\, and it only got worse.\nYou can just skip this one in the series ... Episode 7 feeds into Episode 9 just fine\, and you just ignore Episode 8 completely.
